::: {.roi-problem-statement style="background: #FFF8F0; padding: 24px; border-left: 4px solid var(--bim-orange); margin-bottom: 40px;"}
**The Challenge:** Traditional quantity surveying takes 6-8 weeks with ¬±10-15% accuracy. Poor estimates lead to budget overruns, delays, and costly rework. Housing cooperatives and developers lose millions in preventable costs.

**The Solution:** BIM 5D estimation delivers in 3-10 days with ¬±5% accuracy, reducing change orders, eliminating rework, and saving 30-50% on procurement costs.
:::
